description: A React functional component for managing role assignments within a UI, including assigning roles to users, switching roles, and rendering a role management table with modal dialogs.

methods.name: assignRole
methods.description: Sets the selected role and shows the modal dialog for assigning a user to that role.

methods.name: handleAssign
methods.description: Updates the roles state with the new user assignment for the selected role.

methods.name: AssignRoleForm
methods.description: A React functional component rendering the form to assign a user to a specific role.
